title: About Gigaverse
text: Gigaverse is a crypto RPG by GLHF, live on Abstract and powered by Proof of Play. Core loop: progress, earn, upgrade your character, and collect rare items. Keywords: RPG, Abstract, Proof of Play, progression, items.

title: Getting Started
text: Start by learning movement, core UI, and progression loop: gather resources, fight or explore, gain XP, and upgrade. Keywords: beginner, start, tutorial, controls, progression, leveling.

title: Pots
text: Pots are breakable containers that drop utility materials and items. There are two types of pots: Blue and Brown. Keywords: pots, break, drops, materials, blue pot, brown pot.

title: Pots
text: Breaking pots costs 5 Energy and requires Hands crafted in the Workbench. Blue pots use Paper Hands; Brown pots use Rock Hands. Keywords: 5 energy, hands, workbench, paper hands, rock hands.

title: Pots
text: Blue pots (Paper Hands) may contain: Giga Shards, Dungeon Scrap, Wood, Stone, and a Glass Orb (Rare). Keywords: giga shards, dungeon scrap, glass orb, rare, wood, stone.

title: Pots
text: Brown pots (Rock Hands) may contain: Giga Shards, Dungeon Scrap, Stone, Wood, Bone, Fiber, Blank Tomes, Small/Medium consumables, and a Ruby Key (Epic). Keywords: ruby key, epic, bone, fiber, blank tomes, consumables.

title: Chests
text: Chests provide loot on timers and are found in specific world locations. Examples include Normal Chest and Juice Chest. Keywords: chest, claim, cooldown, weekly, materials.

title: Chests
text: Normal Chest location: bottom of the map on the right side of the fishing area. Claimable once per week. Keywords: normal chest, weekly, fishing area, bottom right.

title: Chests
text: Juice Chest contains Hexchain, Sapphire, and Soulmint (exclusive charm crafting materials). Keywords: juice chest, hexchain, sapphire, soulmint, charm crafting.

title: Giga Juice
text: Giga Juice is a premium/boost system tied to extra access/benefits inside Gigaverse. Keywords: giga juice, boosts, benefits, access.

title: Giga Juice
text: Benefits can include exclusive access and gameplay advantages described in the Giga Juice section. Keywords: benefits, perks, premium, access.

title: Giga Juice
text: Giga Juice purchase info is documented in the 'How To Buy Giga Juice?' page. Keywords: buy, purchase, giga juice, instructions.

title: Gigamarket
text: Gigamarket is the in-game marketplace/trading hub where players can exchange items. Keywords: trade, marketplace, buy, sell, listings.

title: Traveling Merchants
text: Traveling Merchants are special vendors/events that offer rotating items or deals. Keywords: merchant, vendor, traveling, rotation.

title: Factions
text: Factions are a gameplay-aligned system with identity/progression and faction-specific activity. Related page: Faction Altar Room. Keywords: factions, allegiance, faction altar, progression.

title: Faction Altar Room
text: Faction Altar Room relates to faction mechanics and how players interact with faction systems in-world. Keywords: altar room, faction room, choose faction, faction mechanics.

title: Dungetron Overview
text: Dungetron covers dungeon-style combat progression, rewards, and challenge flow. Keywords: dungeon, combat, dungetron, runs, rewards.

title: Echo Battles
text: Echo Battles are a combat mode/event type within Gigaverse. Keywords: echo battles, combat mode, fights.

title: Combat Skill Points
text: Combat Skill Points are used to power up combat-related progression. Keywords: skill points, upgrades, combat tree.

title: Fishing Overview
text: Fishing is a major gathering/progression activity with fish discovery and skill progression. Keywords: fishing, rods, bait, fish, progression.

title: Fishing Spells
text: Fishing spells provide special effects/boosts related to fishing. Keywords: spells, fishing boosts, effects.

title: Fishing Skill Points
text: Fishing skill points upgrade fishing performance and unlock fishing improvements. Keywords: fishing skill points, upgrades, progression.

title: Fishing Equipment
text: Fishing equipment includes tools/gear for better fishing outcomes. Keywords: equipment, rod, upgrades.

title: Fish Findex
text: Fish Findex is a catalog/index of fish and fishing discoveries. Keywords: findex, fish list, collection.

title: Fish Stall
text: Fish Stall is a fishing-related vendor/interaction point. Keywords: fish stall, vendor, sell fish.

title: Crafting Overview
text: Crafting converts materials into usable items, gear, and tools via stations (Workbench, Alchemy Bench, etc.). Keywords: crafting, recipes, materials, stations.

title: Workbench
text: Workbench is a main crafting station used for items like Hands (used to break pots). Keywords: workbench, hands, crafting station.

title: Alchemy Bench
text: Alchemy Bench is used for alchemy-related crafting. Keywords: alchemy, potions, bench.

title: Hatchery
text: Hatchery relates to egg/creature hatching mechanics. Keywords: hatchery, eggs, hatching.

title: Gear Station
text: Gear Station focuses on equipment/gear crafting and upgrades. Keywords: gear, equipment, crafting.

title: Conquest Overview
text: Conquest is a combat/progression mode focused on broader objectives. Keywords: conquest, mode, objectives, battles.

title: Giga Creators Program
text: Giga Creators Program covers creator/builder participation and ecosystem building. Keywords: creators, builders, program, contribute.

title: Gigus Maximus
text: Gigus Maximus is a key lore figure in Gigaverse. Keywords: gigus maximus, lore, story, character.

title: Auctioneer
text: Auctioneer is a lore/special character connected to auctions and story. Keywords: auctioneer, auctions, lore.

title: Tonno & Cyclops
text: Tonno & Cyclops are lore/special characters in the Gigaverse world. Keywords: tonno, cyclops, lore.

title: Hugis & Munis
text: Hugis & Munis are lore/special characters. Keywords: hugis, munis, lore.

title: Fair Play Rules
text: Fair Play Rules define acceptable behavior and gameplay integrity rules. Keywords: fair play, rules, cheating, abuse.

title: Links & Contracts
text: Links & Contracts page collects official links and contract references. Keywords: contracts, official links, verification.
